hero.title: Transform Your
hero.description: From the developers that brought you the greatest modded YouTube apps, comes Morphe - the powerful app modification tool that puts you in control

feature.ad-blocking-desc: Block all ads and enjoy uninterrupted content across your apps
feature.sponsorblock-desc: Skip sponsored segments automatically with community-powered timestamps
feature.show-dislikes-desc: See real dislike counts to make better viewing decisions
feature.swipe-controls-desc: Control volume and brightness with intuitive swipe gestures
feature.custom-themes-desc: Personalize your app with beautiful custom themes and colors
feature.hide-content-desc: Hide unwanted content, Shorts, and recommendations for a cleaner feed

how-it-works.title: How Morphe Works
how-it-works.subtitle: Simple, powerful, and built for everyone
how-it-works.step1-desc: Download the latest version of Morphe and install it on your Android device.
how-it-works.step2-desc: Select the app you want to modify.
how-it-works.step3-desc: Morphe will automatically patch your selected app.
how-it-works.step4-desc: Install the patched app and enjoy your customized experience.

testimonials.title: What Users Say
testimonials.subtitle: Feedback from real users and definitely not made up

quote_1.text: I used to spend hours configuring patches manually. Now I just click 'Patch' and go make coffee. By the time I'm back, it's done. Revolutionary!
quote_1.author: Lisa Smith

quote_2.text: Every other patcher feels like performing blindfolded brain surgery. But with Morphe it's a few clicks and my patched app is supercharged and greater than ever.
quote_2.author: Alex Chen

quote_3.text: It's like Vanced, but better, and without the weird corporate party vibes.
quote_3.author: Sarah Johnson

quote_4.text: My 87 year old grandma asked me why my YouTube looks different. I showed her Morphe and now she's patching apps for her entire retirement community.
quote_4.author: David Kin

quote_5.text: I tried other patchers and my phone caught fire. With Morphe, my phone is just perfectly modified. 10/10 would not spontaneously combust again.
quote_5.author: Ryan Martinez

quote_6.text: My cat knocked my phone off the table while Morphe was patching. The phone survived and patching still completed successfully. Cat approved.
quote_6.author: Emma Jones

quote_7.text: I showed Morphe to my tech-illiterate dad. He now patches apps better than I do. I'm questioning my entire career in IT.
quote_7.author: Tom Anderson

quote_8.text: My ex-girlfriend got back together with me after I started using Morphe. Coincidence? I think not!
quote_8.author: Mike Thompson

quote_9.text: Morphe is the only thing saving me from 60 second unskippable ads about toothpaste.
quote_9.author: Casey Morgan

quote_10.text: I thought Morphe was an obscure Greek god. Turns out it's better.
quote_10.author: Oliver Grant

quote_11.text: Before I found Morphe, I thought APK was a new K-pop band. Now I know better.
quote_11.author: Jeff Cooper

quote_12.text: When I saw Morphe is free to download, I reacted the same way as someone offering me free food samples. I don't think, I act.
quote_12.author: Tyler James

quote_13.text: Morphe fixed my WiFi, paid my taxes, and solved world hunger. Actually no, but it did patch YouTube perfectly.
quote_13.author: Sarah Williams

quote_14.text: I showed Morphe to my dog and now he's better with using technology than I am.
quote_14.author: Kevin Park

quote_15.text: Morphe patched my apps so well that I now wonder if it can also patch my life choices.
quote_15.author: Doug Miller

quote_16.text: I clicked the wrong button and accidentally became a millionaire. Not sure how it happened but Morphe was involved.
quote_16.author: Lucky Luke

quote_17.text: Thanks to Morphe's ad-blocking feature, I finally had the mental clarity to finish my research and change the course of human history. Morphe deserves the Nobel prize more than me.
quote_17.author: Dr. Sheldon Lee

quote_18.text: I showed my friends Morphe and now they think I'm some kind of underground technology wizard. I'm not correcting them.
quote_18.author: Owen Price

quote_19.text: Morphe blocked so many ads that my phone feels lighter. I think it lost emotional weight.
quote_19.author: Sienna Brooks

microg.title: Download
microg.description: MicroG is required to use YouTube Morphe and YT Music Morphe
microg.feature1-desc: MicroG provides Google Play Services support, enabling the use of your Google account with YouTube Morphe and YT Music Morphe.
microg.feature2-desc: MicroG is an open-source reimplementation of Google services that respects your privacy while providing essential functionality.
microg.feature3-desc: Install MicroG once and it works with all your Morphe apps. No need to reinstall when updating YouTube Morphe and YT Music Morphe.

translate.title: Help Us Translate
translate.description: Make Morphe accessible to millions of users worldwide by translating it into your language
translate.step1-desc: Create a free Crowdin account. It only takes a minute and gives you access to translate Morphe and other open source projects.
translate.step2-desc: Select the language you want to translate into. You can contribute to new translations or improve existing ones.
translate.step3-desc: Use Crowdin's intuitive interface to translate strings. Every contribution helps make Morphe accessible to more users.
translate.step4-desc: Your translations will be reviewed and included in future Morphe releases, helping users around the world.
